metadata.title: CVE-2024-37535 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
GNOME VTE before 0.76.3 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a window resize escape sequence, a related issueto CVE-2000-0476.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-37535` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-vte-2.91 - 0.68.0-1ubuntu0.1
libvte-2.91-0 - 0.68.0-1ubuntu0.1
libvte-2.91-common - 0.68.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vte2.91 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.68.0-1ubuntu0.1').
